data.title: Secret Exit Ltd.
data.meta_description: Secret Exit Game Development (Skinflake Games until 2006) is the official name for the tAAt development team. The early games were distributed with the tAAt name, but later they changed it to Skinflake Games, and eventually Secret Exit Game...
data.text: Secret Exit Game Development (Skinflake Games until 2006) is the official name for the tAAt development team. The early games were distributed with the tAAt name, but later they changed it to Skinflake Games, and eventually Secret Exit Game Development, although tAAt still exists.
